Uses of Package
org.apache.shiro.event

  • Packages that use org.apache.shiro.event 
    Package Description
    org.apache.shiro.config
    Components that support configuring Shiro in any application.
    org.apache.shiro.config.event  
    org.apache.shiro.event  
    org.apache.shiro.event.support  
    org.apache.shiro.mgt
    Provides the master SecurityManager interface and a default implementation hierarchy for managing all aspects of Shiro's functionality in an application.
    org.apache.shiro.session.mgt
    SessionManager components supporting enterprise session management.
    org.apache.shiro.web.mgt
    Components supporting web-specific SecurityManager implementations.
    org.apache.shiro.web.session.mgt  
  • Classes in org.apache.shiro.event used by org.apache.shiro.config 
    Class and Description
    EventBus
    An event bus can publish events to event subscribers as well as provide a mechanism for registering and unregistering event subscribers.
  • Classes in org.apache.shiro.event used by org.apache.shiro.config.event 
    Class and Description
    Event
    Root class for all of Shiro's event classes.
    Subscribe
    Indicates a method is an event consumer.
  • Classes in org.apache.shiro.event used by org.apache.shiro.event 
    Class and Description
    EventBus
    An event bus can publish events to event subscribers as well as provide a mechanism for registering and unregistering event subscribers.
  • Classes in org.apache.shiro.event used by org.apache.shiro.event.support 
    Class and Description
    EventBus
    An event bus can publish events to event subscribers as well as provide a mechanism for registering and unregistering event subscribers.
  • Classes in org.apache.shiro.event used by org.apache.shiro.mgt 
    Class and Description
    EventBus
    An event bus can publish events to event subscribers as well as provide a mechanism for registering and unregistering event subscribers.
    EventBusAware
    Interface implemented by components that utilize an EventBus for publishing and/or subscribing to/from events and wish that EventBus to be supplied if one is available.
  • Classes in org.apache.shiro.event used by org.apache.shiro.session.mgt 
    Class and Description
    EventBus
    An event bus can publish events to event subscribers as well as provide a mechanism for registering and unregistering event subscribers.
    EventBusAware
    Interface implemented by components that utilize an EventBus for publishing and/or subscribing to/from events and wish that EventBus to be supplied if one is available.
  • Classes in org.apache.shiro.event used by org.apache.shiro.web.mgt 
    Class and Description
    EventBusAware
    Interface implemented by components that utilize an EventBus for publishing and/or subscribing to/from events and wish that EventBus to be supplied if one is available.
  • Classes in org.apache.shiro.event used by org.apache.shiro.web.session.mgt 
    Class and Description

    Interface implemented by components that utilize an EventBus for publishing and/or subscribing to/from events and wish that EventBus to be supplied if one is available.
